long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you often skip your morning routine because you're becoming blind to it, or you have trouble sticking to small habits, then this is for you. We block your browser until you've ticked everything off!

Want to create microhabits, such as tidying your bed every morning, drinking a pint of water every day, meditation, clearing email, anything at all? Add what you want to do every morning, and get it done before you start anything else.
